overview: Providing behind the scenes footage of the director on set with clips from his own films, Martin Scorsese Directs depicts to riveting effect the way Scorsese brings the written story to life on the big screen. Additional interviews with the likes of Joe Pesci, Harvey Keitel, Thelma Schoonmaker, the directorâ€™s own parents, and others build a perception of Scorsese that not everybody knows.
tagline: All This Filming, Is It Healthy?
title: Martin Scorsese Directs
